content.body: Can we consider a normative change to get stop exposing `islamic-rgsa`, given it's not implementable? I'd say that `islamic` sounds pretty questionable without providing an API to specify the location at which the observation is being made.
content.formatted_body: Can we consider a normative change to get stop exposing islamic-rgsa, given it's not implementable? I'd say that islamic sounds pretty questionable without providing an API to specify the location at which the observation is being made.
